name: interfluve
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a higher area between the valleys of streams or rivers: Interfluves are areas of high terrain located between valleys. In the Danube-Tisza interfluve, lakes are threatened by environmental problems.
More examplesFewer examplesWide, shallow valleys are separated by interfluves. Cultivation in the interfluves has increased.The area has well-drained interfluves.
